website_summaries.verdict: A well made tank that doesn't break the bank. A perfect choice for owners of small snakes.
pros: We were pleasantly surprised at the durability of the top screen
It is thick and able to support the included lamps with ease
Comes with both a daytime and nighttime lamp
Also includes a humidity and temperature gauge, which we found helpful
cons: The included light bulbs burn out quickly

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the desert setup for my teenage nephew for his Leopard Gecko. It was quick to put together and we are happy with the quality. Also purchased a warm heating mat for under the cage and only use the night heating lamp, the white light seems to be harsh on the gecko's eyes. Amazon has great hiding cave rocks we bought and put in the cage as well and the gecko loves it especially when he is shedding with a very soft moist paper towel on the floor of the cave. This was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Hike Northern California

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I saw a lot of negative reviews, but I took a chance anyway. I received everything listed in the description, so I’m very pleased with that. It’s a little smaller than I anticipated, but it’ll work for now. I don’t think the temperature gadge works properly though. It’s saying my tortoises enclosure is 50° which is impossible because my house is 72° and she’s got a heat lamp. Overall, it’s pretty good if your pet is going to stay pretty small.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Locke

customer_reviews.title: Nice little bundle, but not the highest quality.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a small leopard gecko. The tank arrived in great condition and it came with everything that was listed. It was nice to have it all in one bundle. My only complaint is the light fixture. It got really hot, and fast. I have two other tanks and those light fixtures are hot, but not scary hot like this one. I tried a different bulb and it did the same thing. I will be getting a higher quality light fixture ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Litchard

customer_reviews.title: Bad light bulbs?
customer_reviews.text: Love the tank. Got it as a starter for my juvinile beardie. The only problem is I just got him today and started using the lamps TODAY, and the day time light burnt out in a matter of hours. Otherwise great bundle.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter hofmans

customer_reviews.title: Ok tank
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly because it was a little cheaper then the pet store. However it was sufficient for my lizard but it did not have all the components the pet store offered. It was not in its original packing. Therefore I could of had a rebate offer of $15. My guess rhisvitem was not brand new as stated. Next tank I will get from local pet store. You know the old saying you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: LuvThePens

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Using this as a bird brooder. Perfect for keeping my birds warm while they grow in their feathers. I put a layer of shredded paper (commercial pet bedding appropriate for birds) and a stuffed animal to watch over the babies.
customer_reviews.author: Tammyoeo

customer_reviews.title: It will be perfect to house baby bearded dragons
customer_reviews.text: My product came intact, and on time. It will be perfect to house baby bearded dragons. The top screen is also very sturdy which is nice since the lights will be sitting on it. Overall for the price this was a good perchase, however the box it came in was not labeled fragile so that makes ordering this item a little bit of a gamble.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Friesner

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Honestly thought it was a complete set up with the accessories. Only got tank and two lights. One bulb already failed after one week of receiving it. Wasnt worth the price honestly. Had to buy all the other accesories which ended costing much more. Much better deals on here.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great kit but no UVB Bulb
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter pack for a small reptile. However, you will need to purchase an additional UVB Bulb -VERY IMPORTANT - as this kit does not come with one. I found out the hard way after my bearded dragon started having health issues. I know it's my fault for not reading more carefully but hopefully I can help someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! I like that everything you need is all ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I like that everything you need is all together. I just added a rock and a plant for climbing. I have hav a green Anole female who will lay eggs so this gives her plenty of space.
customer_reviews.author: ARiek

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISING@!!!
customer_reviews.text: FALSE ADVERTISEMENT!!! :'( THIS IS WHAT THE PRODUCT STATES THE Features & details ARE.... An ideal habitat for desert-dwelling animals- TRUE Size 10 glass terrarium with fresh air screen cover- TRUE Two 5.5” Reflective Dome Light Fixtures- FALSE!!!!!! Night Black Incandescent and White Spot Bulbs- FALSE This product did NOT come with everything stated in the description. I would like to talk to customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsy Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: I only gave it 4 stars because when I got ...
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it 4 stars because when I got it there was a large crack on one of the sides. There was also no fragile sticker or written in the box, but it came with a lot of helpful things.
customer_reviews.author: john binnebose

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly how it shows. People complain about broken glass, but that didn’t happen to me. As a matter of fact, they used extra foam in the quick shipping. The only thing I would warn u is the bulbs are kinda cheap.
customer_reviews.author: nada

customer_reviews.title: Great tank but one light fixture is not right
customer_reviews.text: Great tank and lighting. The only thing I am having a problem with is with one of the lights. It's not working right. Keeps flickering kind if worries me a little. Might need a new light fixture for sure.
customer_reviews.author: jessica reeves

customer_reviews.title: Great item but recieved Damaged!!!
customer_reviews.text: I highly dislike that i recieved my package with a crack in the tank. Package contained all the items that was listed in the description. I am happy with the quality of the items. I do not know though what to do about the crack in the front top right part of our tank. I was so excited to recoeve the setup but unpacking it a d realizing it was cracked i was so disappointed. The carpet for this tank is also a tad to big and it will need to be trimmed to fit the sizing of the tank.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky143xoxo

customer_reviews.title: Light Bulb defective
customer_reviews.text: We received our kit a few day ago and wrapped up for presents to open tonight. We picked up the gecko today with a plan to set up the terrarium tonight so the gecko can stay warm. We got everything put together, turned on the white day light and the light blew. With it being christmas, no stores will be open for a replacement bulb, the soonest I can get on shipped is Thursday. So due to the defective lightbulb, our brand new gecko is at risk. Sad day.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Bare basics setup.
customer_reviews.text: Beginner tank with the bare minimum basics. Came with tank, lid, lights and substrate. Have found similar tanks with the added extras of a hide and water bowl included for similar price at other retailers. Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pirkey

customer_reviews.title: Decor and dishes I have pictured did not come with, so you'll need some.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite thing about this starter set up is how the lights attach to the cover. Makes feeding and getting the dragon out super easy. Definitely just a starter tank tho. Or older dragon is in a 75 gallon I believe.
customer_reviews.author: charline

customer_reviews.title: Is ok
customer_reviews.text: Is great but one of my light fixtures stopped working and made my bearded dragon cold for the day while I was at work. Not ok. Update: Both light fixtures are useless garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie

customer_reviews.title: Its nice but
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent product. It has everything you need to get started. The reason I give it three stars is when I received mine the UV light didn't work and still doesn't so I had to buy another one because I couldn't wait to mess with sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Brown

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated
customer_reviews.text: The picture is very misleading. I thought the “kit” included everything in the picture. It doesn’t come with the rock, plants, or water bowl. It’s only specified in the description what IS included. I realize it’s my fault for not combing through the description well enough. They could make it clear the decor is NOT included. Just saying.
customer_reviews.author: Carnie Frizzell

customer_reviews.title: Not everything in package!
customer_reviews.text: This litterally came with only the cage, and no lid. The description says it comes with heat lamp and bulbs, and it is a starter kit. This is all false. Bogus comments that are all fake, besides this one. Do not buy. You will waste your time, effort, and money. From very pissed off ex-customer.
customer_reviews.author: Petrina

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing to say the least!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item twice by the seller. Both times the item came with only the glass terrarium sans lid, light, heat and starter kit. Super bummer for a 10 year bold that saved his $$ to purchase this and item shows up with only one thing in it. Sent message to Amazon as well and they couldn't fix the issue. Wouldn't waste your time with this one.
customer_reviews.author: KD07

customer_reviews.title: NOT for bearded dragons!
customer_reviews.text: Far too small for a bearded dragon and ABSOLUTELY DO NOT use the black light that comes with it!!! Tank is a decent size for a small collection of feeder bugs, however. Tank and screen are expected quality.
customer_reviews.author: LindseyStar

customer_reviews.title: Came quickly
customer_reviews.text: Came very quickly exactly what was needed for my daughter baby bearded dragon. Included lights, thermostat, food and water dish, and carpet. Perfect for beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our son. He uses it to house his long tailed lizard. It came with several items needed for a reptile.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Quality is fine but not as good of a deal as it seems. You still need to supplement items from the store.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: White light is harsh but other than that, great tank!
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I’m going to get a Leopard gecko and tank, mat and lights are good. It’s just that the white light is very harsh and should probably keep it on for 5 - 10 hours. Other than that is is perfect! Also purchased other supplies for tank. I think mine and your animals will like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad light fixtures
customer_reviews.text: The kit was easy to assemble and it looks good, but the light fixture went out already. That's the only reason why I didn't give it more stars.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Items included in the description are not included.
customer_reviews.text: According to the description, two 5.5” Reflective Dome Light Fixtures are included, but I only received one. Additionally. a Night Black Incandescent and White Spot Bulb are supposed to be included but I only received the night incandescent light.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Saravia

customer_reviews.title: The terrarium seems nice enough for our purposes
customer_reviews.text: The terrarium seems nice enough for our purposes, but as it came without the screen we have not been able to use it. Update to come once we have a screen!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Chittenden

customer_reviews.title: Prone to damage while shipping
customer_reviews.text: The product wasn't in original packaging and was cracked on all sides, with one side being completely shattered. The protective materials used did nothing to prevent damage.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Jo Cass

customer_reviews.title: Good condition
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking all the stuff came in it but it doesn’t. It is a tank in good condition
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: All items are useful
customer_reviews.text: I like that it comes with everything to start with
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Spears

customer_reviews.title: Cage.
customer_reviews.text: For a starter kit, has no heat pad. The light only lasted 1 day and blew out.... cage seems to be ok. The locking system is sketchy. Get if you only need to hold your animal until you get a better cage.
customer_reviews.author: Tom hope

customer_reviews.title: Came in one piece!!!
customer_reviews.text: Came in one piece! Looks great! Perfect for a first time tank, till ready to move up to a better tank.
customer_reviews.author: Jole Cole

customer_reviews.title: light burnt out in less than an hour
customer_reviews.text: Heat lamp fails less than hour after setup. Would like to have it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: L. A.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Basic essentials for our new leopard gecko. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Dale

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece
customer_reviews.text: I love the kit, I ordered 2. Only problem is in one of the kits I did not receive the bulb that comes with it. Not sure how to contact the company to just get the bulb
customer_reviews.author: nakea wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift for a nephew. Everything needed ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a nephew. Everything needed is included. I didn't want to go to the pet store nd buy piece by piece. Worth is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little starter kit for a corn snake. Had to buy. Better uth though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ripped off
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with everything in the description. So it's not an actual starter kit and you in turn get ripped off no bottom piece and only a black light. And the humidity gage and the screen top.
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything was fine except the light bulb does not work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect setup
customer_reviews.text: The kit was almost perfect. The reptile carpet was a tad bit too long for the length of the tank, but it's a minor flaw. My leopard gecko seems to have settled in pretty well so far.
customer_reviews.author: B. Neuls

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, came broken though.. will not ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, came broken though..will not buy again, trust went out the window-real quick.. i was expecting to get my snake this week.. not anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Ups sucks! They destroy other people's items.
customer_reviews.text: Beyond mad!! I want this shipped over night. We heard the ups driver kicked it and my dogs went nuts!
customer_reviews.author: Brettalundgren

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, obviously.
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced. Obviously overpriced. Just because you make the glass cage for reptile only doesn't mean your cage is good for them and worth 10 times of other use cage.
customer_reviews.author: Ryoizard

customer_reviews.title: Starter Terrarium
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this starter terrarium for our small collard lizard. It is perfect as a small terarium with two heat lamps (one for day and one for night) and a mat for the bottom. Easy to set up. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great item for Leopard Gecko
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my sons leopard gecko . It is a great size and had all the needed things to get started . Like other reviews 1 of the 2 bulbs did not work , however it was a cheap fix , we went to PetSmart and purchased another .
customer_reviews.author: Samantha L. Pina

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this product! And the tank is a nice size, buty night time light went out the second day I used it /: other than that everything is great!
customer_reviews.author: hunter kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit but my little guy outgrew quite quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mellissa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could've had the UPC code from original box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Zilla Reptile Starter Kit 10 with Light and Heat
product_meta.description: Size:Desert| Product Packaging:Frustration-Free PackagingThe Desert Reptile Starter Kit makes an ideal Starter habitat. Each kit comes with two Reflective Dome light fixtures, a Black Incandescent bulb for nighttime heat, and a White Spot Bulb for daytime basking. The Screen Cover will keep your critter safe and secure inside their home. The Humidity/Temperature Gauge allows for a quick and easy read on the environment parameters to ensure they are at the right levels. The Brown Terrarium Liner is a low maintenance, odor-fighting carpet substrate that cannot be digested and is non-abrasive.
feature_bullets: An ideal habitat for desert-dwelling animals
Size 10 glass terrarium with fresh air screen cover
Night Black Incandescent and White Spot Bulb

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
